p: Although the world is already preparing to tackle the newest emergent virus strain [ 1], vaccine research and development are highly complex and require concerted public funding efforts for a long period of time [ 8, 13]. In order to improve the efficiency of the allocation of the funding for infectious disease-related R&D, it is necessary to understand the current trends of coronavirus disease-related scientific research funding around the world to consider the directions for the global collaborative research and development [ 14, 15].
